entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
